summary: Allows spell tomes to be purchased at any time
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows adept and expert spell tomes, which you are normally only allowed to purchase once you reach a certain skill level, to be purchased at any time. You\'ll still need to complete the relevant quests to obtain the master level tomes. I felt the fact that the spells cost twice as much until you obtain sufficient levels to get the perks was restrictive enough.

[b]Important Note[/b]
The effect of this mod on a saved game is [b]permanent[/b], even if you later remove the mod, since it simply tells the game you\'re allowed to buy the tomes the first time it\'s run.

[b]Known bugs/conflicts[/b]
None

[b]Compatibility[/b]
This mod only adds content and as such should be compatible with anything. Any mods which add tomes to the relevant levelled lists should also have those tomes unlocked.
author: zyxv
